channel.title: Posts on Haroon's Den
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Haroon's Den

item.title: Back to Hugo and on static site generators and custom themes
item.description: As you can see, this website is kinda different. I remade it, just because why not. I was previously using Hexo with a nice theme called cactus (properly altered to match my preference), but at some point I got tired of that as well.

item.title: Markdown Manual
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
